CustomField.description: A valid Payment Method may be linked to the Registration Group so that the Registration Group is automatically charged for all registration fees for group members the day after the "Sales Closed Date" on the Event.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A valid Payment Method may be linked to the Registration Group so that the Registration Group is automatically charged for all registration fees for group members the day after the "Sales Closed Date" on the Event.
CustomField.label: Payment Method
